plot: A masked folkloric dancer takes a stab at acting by auditioning for a revered playwright's newest tragedy. After panic robs him of his audition, the fleeing masked dancer stages the ultimate revenge during its opening night.
title: Teatro
plot_es: A masked folkloric dancer takes a stab at acting by auditioning for a revered playwright's newest tragedy. After panic robs him of his audition, the fleeing masked dancer stages the ultimate revenge during its opening night.
plot_en: A masked folkloric dancer takes a stab at acting by auditioning for a revered playwright's newest tragedy. After panic robs him of his audition, the fleeing masked dancer stages the ultimate revenge during its opening night.
